questions.questionText: 3. Choose the reactor which is used to bind the application data to the HTML view in AngularJS.
questions.explanation: Answer: A) ng-bind directive is used to bind the application data to the HTML view in AngularJS.

questions.questionText: 4. Choose the correct syntax for writing AngularJS expression.
questions.explanation: Answer: B) {{expressions}} is the correct syntax.

questions.questionText: 5. Choose the advantage of Angular JS among the following.

options.text: B. it uses dependancy injection and makes use of sepration of concerns

questions.questionText: 7. Who is the father of AngularJS?
questions.explanation: Answer: A) Misko Hevery is the father of AngularJS.

questions.questionText: 8. The total $RootScope an AngularJS application can have is?
questions.explanation: Answer:  B) Total $RootScope an AngularJS application can have is 1.

questions.explanation: Answer: D) All of the above can be used to write the AngularJS directives.

questions.questionText: 10. Among the following choose the one which is responsible for the startup of the angular 2 projects.
questions.explanation: Answer: B) main.ts is Responsible for the startup of the angular 2 project
